item.title: Rhinos taken back to Rwanda
item.description: Rhinos taken back to Rwanda The story… Rhinos taken back to Rwanda Learn language related to… conservation Need-to-know language Rhinos - 犀牛🦏 feeding time – period in which an animal or person is given food keepers – professionals who take care of animals released into the wild – set freeinto the natural environment critically endangered – at high risk of extinction. 濒临灭绝的 Descendant of the animals - 后代
